mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from ( select /*+ INDEX_DESC(tbl_board pk_board) */ rownum rn, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from system.tbl_board where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into system.tbl_board (bno, title, content, writer) values (system.seq_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
